info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 20 at 10:36AM AST until April 20 at 1:30PM AST by NWS San Juan PR
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by flood waters from Rio Blanco due to excess runoff.
* WHERE...Humacao and Naguabo.
* WHEN...Until 130 PM AST.
* IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. Streams continue to rise due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. Expect many areas of slow moving or standing water.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1030 AM AST, emergency management are reporting flooding in the warned area due to flood waters from Rio Blanco. Flooding is ongoing, causing road closures along PR-31 in Sector Pitina. Additional areas along the river are likely flooded. Rio Blanco is currently at minor flood stage, around 7.36 ft. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible upstream, causing additional rises along Rio Blanco. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON
